price: Mabustani mangapi, na chemchem ngapi waliziacha!
footnotes: Hao watu wa Firauni baada ya kuzama kwao waliacha mabustani mengi yenye kunawiri, na chemchem zinazo tiririka maji yake,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
